subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Though five games is an absurdly small sample size, only one team in the wild-card era, the 1995 Cincinnati Reds, has reached the postseason after starting 0-5.
snippet: Though five games is an absurdly small sample size, only one team in the wild-card era, the 1995 Cincinnati Reds, has reached the postseason after starting 0-5.
